solution_line_template: That means he needs to climb {total_feet_climbed}*{inches_per_foot}=<<{total_feet_climbed}*{inches_per_foot}={total_inches_climbed}>>{total_inches_climbed} inches
That means he needs to climb {total_inches_climbed}/{inches_per_step}=<<{total_inches_climbed}/{inches_per_step}={total_steps}>>{total_steps} stairs
